thread.title: 'Alli's going to Real Madrid' - Tottenham fans worried after midfielder's masterclass vs Chelsea
thread.title_full: 'Alli's going to Real Madrid' - Tottenham fans worried after midfielder's masterclass vs Chelsea

title: 'Alli's going to Real Madrid' - Tottenham fans worried after midfielder's masterclass vs Chelsea
text:
— Keith Downie (@SkySports_Keith) January 4, 2017 "We had Alli, Dele Alli, not sure we'll ever understand, why we took five mil, for a kid who'll beat Brazil, hurry up and sell to Real" #dele 
Others were less concerned about Alli's sale and were simply enjoying his excellent midfield performance. Dele Alli waving goodbye to Chelsea's chances of breaking the record for most consecutive wins like... https://t.co/qzSvzJpquO — Footy Humour (@FootyHumour) January 4, 2017 Dele Alli is now Dele Ali because he's handed an L to Chelsea — Nozrul Ahmed (@NozrulAhmed) January 4, 2017 Well played Spurs. Dele Alli such a talent. Heads up CFC amazing run but no one cares about records. Go on and win it #TOTCHE — Omid Djalili (@omid9) January 4, 2017 Dele Alli walking out of White Hart Lane after destroying Chelsea's winning streak pic.twitter.com/vgKSvuDnjH — Football Funnys (@FootballFunnys) January 4, 2017 Liking Alli a lot.. back to back seasons showing his class! #Talented — Rio Ferdinand (@rioferdy5) January 4, 2017 
While one Chelsea fan may have a busy month ahead... If we lose to Spurs I'll dedicate my account to Dele Alli for a whole month. But I'm not going to because we wont lose to them. 
He may never want to hear the name 'Dele Alli' again in four weeks' time. Related
